name: Paperless-ngx
short_desc: A community-supported supercharged version of paperless: scan, index and archive all your physical documents
author: paperless-ngx
description: Paperless-ngx is a document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive so you can keep, well, less paper.

form_fields.label: Administrator Username
form_fields.hint: Username for the paperless-ngx Admin user

form_fields.label: Administrator password
form_fields.hint: Password for the paperless-ngx Admin user

form_fields.label: Enable Tika
form_fields.hint: Do you want to enable a Tika server for parsing and converting 'Office' documents (such as '.doc', '.xlsx' and '.odt')

form_fields.label: Trusted Proxies
form_fields.hint: List of comma-separated IPs set as trusted proxies

form_fields.label: Consumer polling
form_fields.hint: Periodically check (seconds) your consumption directory for changes.

form_fields.label: Apps
form_fields.hint: A comma-separated list of Django apps to be included in Django's INSTALLED_APPS

form_fields.label: Redirect login to SSO
form_fields.hint: Users will automatically be redirected to the first SSO provider login.

form_fields.label: Disbale regular login
form_fields.hint: Disables the regular frontend username / password login, i.e. once you have setup SSO.

form_fields.label: Socialaccount providers
form_fields.hint: A JSON string of socialaccount providers to be included in Django's SOCIALACCOUNT_PROVIDERS

form_fields.label: Documents and Thunbnail Location
form_fields.hint: This is where your documents and thumbnails are stored.

form_fields.label: Export Location
form_fields.hint: This is where exports are stored.

form_fields.label: Consume Location
form_fields.hint: This is where your documents should go to be consumed.
